channel.title: Ixtlis - Netty Reference Framework
channel.description:
I recently started writing a Reference Framework, using the Jboss Netty Library, its only feature as of now is log in.
Media:
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/34zkqwz.png[/img]
Download:
[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/74112690/Ixtlis%20Framework.rar]Ixtlis Framework - 1.4 MB[/url]
Credits: Jacob Petra - Myself Graham - Apollo(for reference), Isaac, Packet idea Jboss - Their wonderful networking library RSWikia - its wonderful references
Any and all criticism is WANTED!

item.title: Ixtlis - Netty Reference Framework
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:11, topic:440396”][quote author=Jacob_ link=topic=543071.msg3980645#msg3980645 date=1335219401]
I plan on further developing this in my spare time. Probably won’t complete it to the point of it being completely playable. (skills, etc.) but it’s a good learning experience.
[/quote]
You should add the basics
player updating, packets and such,
but keeping it noobfriendly,
so PI & delta can be left behind[/quote]

Delta is gone now. Of course there will always be a few people using it, but whatever. Everyone has to start somewhere. I doubt you started private servers with Hyperion.
PI won’t be left behind for quite some time. Delta took awhile, don’t expect PI to be gone soon. Also, 500 releases of blank frameworks are not going to be what drive it out of its place.

Read full topic

item.title: Ixtlis - Netty Reference Framework

item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Theres already a packet system implemented. He just needs to create the packets.

item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Jacob_:

I plan on further developing this in my spare time. Probably won’t complete it to the point of it being completely playable. (skills, etc.) but it’s a good learning experience.

You should add the basics
player updating, packets and such,
but keeping it noobfriendly,
so PI & delta can be left behind

Its to bad, everybody is releasing those 5% of their frameworks, and never finish it.

so its a total waste of time and space.

when u start it. finish it. or dont release it
[/quote]You are fucking dumb.

OT: Thanks for sharing.

no he’s right…[/quote]Thought he was talking about it not loading anything.

item.title: Ixtlis - Netty Reference Framework
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“DevotionPk, post:4, topic:440396”]i can see no screen.
fix it.
and poo on the logout button.[/quote]

It’s a framework, not a ‘leech and host’ server.
People build off (or create their own) frameworks to create servers such as PI, Delta and everything else out there.

Read full topic
